## Checklist

- [ ] No commented-out code or debug statements
- [ ] Code is formatted and adheres to the project's coding standards
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Variables and functions are well-named and self-descriptive
- [ ] No sensitive information (e.g., API keys, passwords) is hardcoded
- [ ] Ensure the branch is up-to-date with the target branch (e.g., main/master)
